thread.title: States want new way to pay for parking
thread.title_full: States want new way to pay for parking | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: States want new way to pay for parking
text:
Jersey States are looking for new ways for drivers to pay for their parking.
They want to find an alternative method of payment to accompany paycards and parking discs.
Once they come up with a system, it will be rolled out across the island and it could be as soon as early next year.
There will be at least two phases in the change, first affecting TTS car parks then on-street parking and remaining car parks.
Last updated Tue 6 Oct 2015 Read more 2 updates Jersey States look for alternative to paycards Travel Jersey
